SENT.plain: Delta-8-tetrahydrocannabinol (delta-8-THC), a cannabinoid with lower psychotropic potency than the main Cannabis constituent, delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol (delta-9-THC), was administered (18 mg/m2 in edible oil, p.o.) to eight children, aged 3-13 years with various hematologic cancers, treated with different antineoplastic drugs for up to 8 months
The total number of treatments with delta-8-THC so far is 480
The THC treatment started two hours before each antineoplastic treatment and was continued every 6 hrs for 24 hours
The side effects observed were negligible
